meanings.definition: A long, loose-fitting robe worn in the Middle East.
meanings.sent1: He wore a comfortable galabieh to the market.
meanings.sent2: The man proudly donned his colorful galabieh for the celebration.
meanings.sent3: The galabieh danced in the wind as if it had a life of its own.
meanings.sent4: His galabieh was a flowing river of fabric as he walked through the bustling streets.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the galabieh brightened up the dull room.

meanings.definition: A traditional garment typically worn by men in Egypt and other Arab countries.
meanings.sent1: In the hot desert, the galabieh provided much-needed relief from the sun.
meanings.sent2: During the festival, everyone wore their best galabieh to honor the tradition.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to play hide-and-seek with the hanging galabieh.
meanings.sent4: His galabieh was a symbol of his heritage, connecting him to his ancestors.
meanings.sent5: The intricate embroidery on the galabieh told a story of craftsmanship and culture.
